files.help: You can set a custom location for this file using the `--price-db $XDG_DATA_HOME/pricedb` flag.

Move file to `$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/ledger/ledgerrc`.
See [1960](https://github.com/ledger/ledger/pull/1960).

If using an older version, alias ledger to use a custom configuration file:

```bash
ledger --init-file "$XDG_CONFIG_HOME"/ledgerrc
```
